document_data.name: Gemblaunt Isle
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gemblaunt Isle''' was a small island-residence found in the city of [[Myth Drannor]]. It was the home of [[Arguth]] the Gem-Mage, one of the casters that originally helped raise the ''[[mythal]]'' that protected the city, prior to the [[Opening]] that allowed in various races of [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: The island was a vibrant place, decorated with a [[rose]] bushes of many colors, including white, blue, green, and red.
document_data.Location: Gemblaunt's Isle was situated in the middle of [[Glyrryrl's Pool]], within Myth Drannor's [[Myth Drannor/Kerradunath|Kerradunath]] district. It was accessible by means of walkway that extended on from [[Gondrim's Ride]].
document_data.Structure: The main tower of the island's building-complex was formed of gray stone and highlighted with [[silver]] embellishments.
